FwkSenCnt.COMMENT: For PHASE 2B TRANSLATORS: the brief examples are formulaic and not from the corpus.
FwkSenCnt.MEANING: an unmarried French-speaking woman, especially as a form of address or title

ExCnt.EX: It is well, Mademoiselle; such is our reward in this life.
" Is mademoiselle about to marry , then ?
Mademoiselle, neither titles nor crowned heads excite my modesty; and publicity is very much my element.

FwkCorPattCnt.CORPAT: nearly always abbreviated before a name

ExCnt.EX: We meet Daria Lasunskaia herself , her daughter Natalia and two figures not previously mentioned : Pigasov and the French governess , Mlle Boncourt .
For most of the autumn and spring term Mlle . Janine Dauvin helped with French conversation ; her charm and vivacity were much appreciated .
